title: Name SkiaSharp.View.Desktop does not exist in Winform project
body:
Error CS0234: The type or namespace name 'View' does not exist in the namespace 'SkiaSharp' (are you missing an assembly reference?)

I was able to compile a SkiaSharp project until this line was added in SharpDevelop 4.4 or Visual Studio 2017 Community Release.

using SkiaSharp.View.Desktop;

Development machine is a Windows 10 and build target set to x86, Net 4.5.  

Is this a bug?
